name: duplicate_samples
description: Tests detection of duplicate rows and near-duplicates
notes: DuplicateRowValidator detects near-duplicates with different IDs
SAMPLE_001/002/004/007: identical content (gut, 45, IBD) but different sample_ids
SAMPLE_003/005: identical content (blood, 32, Healthy) but different sample_ids
Detection helps identify potential data entry errors or redundant samples
